description: Manage Arc-enabled SQL managed instance Failover Groups.

commands.name: az sql instance-failover-group-arc create
commands.syntax:
az sql instance-failover-group-arc create --mi
                                          --name
                                          --partner-mi
                                          [--k8s-namespace]
                                          [--no-wait]
                                          [--partner-mirroring-cert-file]
                                          [--partner-mirroring-url]
                                          [--partner-resource-group]
                                          [--partner-sync-mode {async, sync}]
                                          [--primary-mirroring-url]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--role {primary, secondary}]
                                          [--shared-name]
                                          [--use-k8s]
examples: az sql instance-failover-group-arc create --name fogcr --shared-name sharedname1 --mi sqlmi1 --role primary --partner-mi sqlmi2 --partner-mirroring-url 10.20.5.20:970 --partner-mirroring-cert-file ./sqlmi2.cer --use-k8s
az sql instance-failover-group-arc create --name fogcr  --mi sqlmi1 --resource-group primary-rg-name  --partner-mi sqlmi2 --partner-resource-group partner-rg-name --partner-sync-mode async

az sql instance-failover-group-arc create --name fogcr  --mi sqlmi1 --resource-group primary-rg-name  --partner-mi sqlmi2 --partner-resource-group partner-rg-name --partner-sync-mode async --primary-mirroring-url 21.10.6.30:6603 --partner-mirroring-url 10.20.5.20:970

commands.name: az sql instance-failover-group-arc delete
commands.summary: Delete an Arc-enabled SQL Managed Instance failover group.
examples: az sql instance-failover-group-arc delete --name fogcr --mi sqlmi1 -g rg-name

commands.name: az sql instance-failover-group-arc list
examples: az sql instance-failover-group-arc list --mi sqlmi1 -g rg-name

commands.name: az sql instance-failover-group-arc show
commands.summary: Show the details of a failover group resource.
examples: az sql instance-failover-group-arc show --name fogcr1 --mi sqlmi1 -g rg-name

commands.name: az sql instance-failover-group-arc update
commands.syntax:
az sql instance-failover-group-arc update --name
                                          [--k8s-namespace]
                                          [--mi]
                                          [--no-wait]
                                          [--partner-sync-mode {async, sync}]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--role {force-primary-allow-data-loss, force-secondary, secondary}]
                                          [--use-k8s]
examples: az sql instance-failover-group-arc update --name fogcr --role secondary --use-k8s
az sql instance-failover-group-arc update --name fogcr  --role secondary --mi sqlmi1 --resource-group rg-name
